Text:
Thanks Dido_SMK for the upload!
Thanks "SMoKE" for the HARD work u have put in creating this patch!
Can u plz tell me if i can install "PES 2011 Gameplay Patch  By Komu" along with ur patch? I really like the gameplay in that patch.

update is coming soon but wont be available in torrent, the patch have its own exe files that changes the gameplay.


PES 2011 SMoKE Patch 3.0.5: (update)

- Removed some duplicated players
- Finished all transfers
- All teams have correct kits
- Copa libertadores teams are unlocked
- Some small fixes

Expected Release Date: 15.Dec.2010
Great! I love the gameplay in ur patch after playing it for a while. Thx!!

I have logo for all leagues but there are no original kits for any of those, when i press attach for kits, it says " Information! Kit server 2011 is already installed for pes2011.exe" where did i go wrong plz respond

I have same problem like Sergioramos4, there are no kits or emblems in Premier Leauge and some jerseys are mixed up. For instance Lyon have Spartak Moscow jersey :S 
and also when i press attach for kits, it says " Information! Kit server 2011 is already installed for pes2011.exe", same problem like sergioramos4. please help!!?!?!!

I had the same issue until I copied the dll files in the 'DirectX fix' file to my system 32 directory, as stated in the read me file in that folder. 

Awesome work 'SMoKE', I appreciate your work.

read the trouble shooting file included for trouble guys, thats why i made that file.

updates are available at certified websites and main blog.
Not working for me when i try to attach at manager.exe its says error make sure pes 2011.exe is read only something like that, i forgot. Yah it cant attach
